ygData.subject: Re: New Cleric heal spell idea.....
ygData.msgSnippet: The L34 spell heals around 100HP per person.   Not really useful if you ve got a barbarian tank in your party beefed up with Valor and Symbol (~1600HP).  It s
ygData.messageBody:
The L34 spell heals around 100HP per person. Not really useful if you've
got a barbarian tank in your party beefed up with Valor and Symbol
(~1600HP). It's just nice to top off that HP bar if everybody's down a bit.

----- Original Message -----
From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 27, 1999 1:41 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] New Cleric heal spell idea.....


> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
> Yes, we get 2 group heals I believe, the first is word of health, which in
> my normal parties only heals about half a bub per person (if that much).
> The better version of this spell heals a lot more. I think it is a level
> 49 spell.
>
> On Mon, 27 Sep 1999, Sianne . wrote:
>

i am

staff...,
